dataIdInfo.idPurp: This python tool is an example of the generic structure that is required to build the map generator that works with Product on Demand (POD) sample web application. The purpose of this tool is to provide a starting point. User can use this tool and plug in thier custom logic to build a product via POD.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool takes a JSON string from the POD web application and creates a map product. To get this to work with a product place it in the product specific folder and update the podconfig.js to refenrece. See section on setting up new product in the POD configuration document.
